author: Qdzign.com.mx

comments.content: I tend to think this is not a font. It is most likely either hand lettered, or a modified version of a font.

Hello:

I totally agree, maybe some recommendation to use a similar font? something that gives the compressed look...

Thanks!!

Q™ Says: It's All About The Fonts!
